articles.author: Katyanna Quach
articles.title: Europe probes Microsoft's €15M stake in AI upstart Mistral - The Register
articles.description: Cash-for-Azure-access deal went through just as latest LLM landed
articles.content: The European Commission is investigating Microsoft's 15 million ($16.3 million) investment in French startup Mistral, which came just after the latter released a large language model to compete with … [+3182 chars]
